name: Ayase, the Sexy Archer
description:
Ayase is an archer and hunter of the king's court. She has the task of travelling far and wide to eliminate the monsters that have ravaged her homeland. This time, Ayase has to confront a nest of monsters in an abandoned village near the old palace of the king. She receives help to increase her fighting strength from a nearby sorceress in exchange for a price. By following Ayase, helping her win the battle, see how far you can go and you will receive exciting rewards.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
- Game features -

Ayase hot scenes
Fight alongside Ayase, earn gold rewards, and buy puzzle pieces from the secret shop during or after the game.

Experience diverse emotions
You may feel yourself in thrilling and intense situations, relieved when completing levels, feeling like a powerful deity, or captivated by Ayase's allure.

Trading cards and achievements
Trading cards and achievements will be available soon.
